H0.text: Dialysis machine is the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H1.text: Electrocardiogram is the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H2.text: Electroencephalogram is a technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H3.text: Automatic external defibrillators are the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

A4.text: An ECG conveys a large amount of information about the structure of the heart and the function of its electrical conduction system.

A5.text: Continuous monitoring can be conducted by using Holter monitors, internal and external defibrillators and pacemakers, and/or biotelemetry.

A6.text: PysioBank – a free scientific database with physiologic signals (here ecg)

A7.text: Wave Maven – a large database of practice ECG questions provided by Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center
